oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter of Sir Charles Montagu to Sir Edward Montagu
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Montagu, Charles
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Theater--England--London--History--17th century
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Montagus were a family with roots in Northamptonshire. Edward Montagu (1563-1644) carried the title first Baron Montagu; Sir Charles (1564-1625) was his younger brother. In this letter, dated 16 February 1612/13, Charles writes to Edward describing his attendance at the wedding of Princess Elizabeth to Frederick, Count Palatine.
